Pre-Game Insights: Jordan Hawkins is expected to have a significant role due to the absence of key players like Zion Williamson, CJ McCollum, Trey Murphy, and Herb Jones.
Trae Young has been performing exceptionally well without Dejounte Murray, averaging career highs in rebounds and assists.
The Pelicans have a strong record when making 15 or more three-pointers, while the Hawks have struggled defensively against three-pointers.
